title: Nudges & Reminders System
description: Implement automated nudges and reminders to increase member engagement. Includes points expiration warnings, tier progress updates, re-engagement campaigns, and abandoned cart reminders. HIGH PRIORITY competitive feature. Estimated: 2-3 days.

userStories.title: Create nudge types and settings model
userStories.description: Database model to store nudge configurations and settings per tenant.
acceptanceCriteria: NudgeConfig model with: id, tenant_id, nudge_type, is_enabled, frequency_days, message_template
Nudge types: points_expiring, tier_progress, inactive_reminder, trade_in_reminder
Default nudge configs created on tenant setup

userStories.title: Implement points expiring reminder
userStories.description: Notify members when their points are about to expire.
acceptanceCriteria: Check for points expiring within 7 days
Send email with expiration date and point balance
Track nudge sent to prevent duplicates

userStories.title: Implement tier progress reminder
userStories.description: Notify members when they're close to reaching the next tier.
acceptanceCriteria: Detect members within 10% of next tier threshold
Send email with progress and remaining requirement
Don't send if already at highest tier

userStories.title: Implement inactive member re-engagement
userStories.description: Reminder for members who haven't been active in 30+ days.
acceptanceCriteria: Show what they're missing (points balance, tier status)

userStories.title: Implement trade-in reminder
userStories.description: Remind members who haven't done a trade-in recently.
acceptanceCriteria: Detect members with no trade-in in 60+ days
Send reminder about trade-in program benefits
Only for stores with trade-ins enabled

userStories.title: Create nudge settings UI in admin
userStories.description: UI for merchants to configure and enable/disable nudges.
acceptanceCriteria: Test send button (sends to store owner)

userStories.title: Create nudge email templates
userStories.description: Email templates for each nudge type.

userStories.title: Create scheduled nudge processor job
userStories.description: Daily job to process and send all nudges.
acceptanceCriteria: Job runs daily at optimal time (10 AM local)
Processes all nudge types for all tenants
Respects rate limits and email quotas
Logs all nudges sent with success/failure
Job handles errors without failing completely

userStories.title: Track nudge effectiveness
userStories.description: Track open rates, click rates, and conversion for nudges.

userStories.title: Add in-app notifications for nudges
userStories.description: Show nudge messages in customer account extension, not just email.
acceptanceCriteria: Notification banner in customer account UI
Shows same nudge messages as email
